demons.name: Lucifer
demons.role: Fallen angel and rebel against God.

demons.name: Asmodeus
demons.role: The demon of wrath and evil, sometimes linked to lust.

demons.name: Baal
demons.role: God in ancient cultures, later associated with demon.

demons.name: Beelzebub
demons.role: High Demon in Hell, leader of Demons.

demons.name: Belial
demons.role: Linked to evil and alienation from God.

demons.name: Lilith
demons.role: Demonic figure, sometimes associated with child stealing.

demons.name: Azazel
demons.role: The demon or fallen angel, sometimes linked to sin and the scapegoat tradition.

demons.name: Leviathan
demons.role: Described as a sea monster or dragon, sometimes associated with demonic evil.

demons.name: Succubus/Incubus
demons.role: Demonic beings who tempt people through sexual seduction in their sleep.

demons.name: Mazikeen
demons.role: Demon, loyal companion and advisor to Lucifer Morningstar.
